Articles.Content:
I posted a project thread, here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90507-Floofies-Project-Thread

It was approved by a moderator, and then suddenly the OP (Main Topic Post) disappeared. Other members are now posting in it, confused about where the OP went. I'm not sure if this is a glitch, or a moderation mistake. If my post violated the rules in some way, please notify me and allow me the opportunity to revise my post.
New member's posts need to be approved by a moderator before they are visible to the public. I don't know why they might have appeared out of order, but it seems to be sorted out now.

Adding a little bit to this: I'm not 100% familiar with how things work on the technical side myself, but I think what happens is that when a new user edits a post, it goes back into the queue for review again if they're still under the cutoff.
Yeah, basically, you edited your OP while you were still a moderated user, and therefore the post went back to the moderation queue.
